name: Cacp(Cancelled)
description:
The cream and cinnamon project was a passion project that I wanted to reflect, observe and improve.

the game would consist of Amesh(bat) visiting her friend's house for an afternoon. the whole idea would be that you basically would be a passerby in their lives,

so the characters go as follows :

Amesh Jack
Chris

Each character was supposed to be a side of me or my friends and it would be quite personal:

Amesh would resemble the personality and the persona of my uni years

Jack: would be the weird one weird addicted escapist type of character where my friends personalities  would clash adding along with my insecurities when we meet IRL

Chris: would be the most vulnerable side of me trying to hide, to move forwards but  staying in the past with no real development on facing her

cream and cinnamon were the colours of my beloved doggie candy that I lost in early January.I wanted this project to be somewhat of a heartful goodbye but it dragged for too long and other s*** happened that made it unbearable to even bother with it anymore

here is a little funny-serious  pic of Candy

Candy

thank you for checking it out even if it is a cancelled project

have a nice day, good luck with whatever endeavour you are in right now
and when s*** happens c'est la vie
